Name: Sword Game
About the game: Multiplayer. Versus. Co-op. Achievements. Stage-making. Swords. These are all words. And by random chance they also happen to describe all the major features of Sword Game, a free Action-Party game where up to 4 players can have a grand old time slashing and stabbing each other or CPUs. In addition, by an equally peculiar coincidence, none of those words contain the letter Q. Now that is odd.
Meta Title: Sword Game: Aug 21, 2020, MOSN and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sword Game? Check out the release date (Aug 21, 2020), developer insights from MOSN, and a complete game summary.
